description:
Criminal Defense And Personal Injury â€”Serving Oakbrook Terrace and DuPage County

Located in Oakbrook Terrace, the Sutter Law Group, LLC, offers a full range of legal services for a diverse base of clients. The law firm represents individuals, families and business owners throughout Cook, DuPage and Kane counties who have legal needs in any of the following practice areas:

  • State and federal criminal defense, including DUI and drug charges
  • Medical malpractice
  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Workers' compensation
  • Business litigation
  • Divorce and family law
  • Immigration

Led by the highly skilled and seasoned trial attorney Mark Sutter, the law firm has earned a reputation for providing aggressive representation that achieves results. All of the firm's attorneys are well-versed and experienced in their respective practice areas, and they are committed to their clients' best interests and success. Through personalized attention and compassionate counsel, they are able to devise innovative and effective solutions tailored to their clients' unique circumstances.

Using this approach, the firm has amassed millions of dollars in settlements and awards for personal injury victims and their families, as well as achieved favorable verdicts for clients facing criminal charges. Those going through a divorce can rely on the firm for assistance resolving their emotional and sensitive family law issues both inside and outside the courtroom, and business owners can count on the firm for guidance on business operations and strategic planning as well as representation involving commercial litigation.

No matter the legal need a client has related to one of the firm's practice areas, Sutter Law Group, LLC, has the resources necessary to handle any case. The law firm offers free initial consultations as an added measure of convenience for clients.
